sentence.Network_en: He fiercely criticised self-styled educational experts for ignoring Shakespeare.
sentence.Network_cn: 他强烈批评那些无视莎士比亚的自诩为教育专家的人。

sentence.Network_en: She also writes a regular column for the Times Educational Supplement.
sentence.Network_cn: 她也定期为《泰晤士报高等教育增刊》写专栏文章。

sentence.Network_en: He was a champion for Latinos and blacks within the educational system.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一直致力于在教育系统内为美籍拉美人和黑人争取权益。

entry.def: Educational matters or institutions are concerned with or relate to education.

entry.tran: 有教育意义的;教育性的
entry.def: An educational experience teaches you something.

example.ex: The staff should make sure the kids have an enjoyable and educational day.
example.tran: 老师们应该确保孩子们度过愉快而有教育意义的一天。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词"人,物,状态"; 2. 地方; 3. 表形容词,"……的"

Sentence.sentence: The latest congressional report acknowledges the critical importance of technical training, but also asserts that the study of the humanities (人文学科)and social sciences must remain central components of America's educational system at all levels.

For now the app is also iPad-exclusive, and though a few of these educational institutions are giving the hardware away for free, for other students who don't have such a luxury it's an added layer of cost — and an expensive one at that.
Fifty years ago, they were the latest thing in educational reform: big, modern, suburban high schools with students counted in the thousands.

It is also of concern that the misguided advice that students should speak only English is given primarily to poor families with limited educational opportunities, not to wealthier families who have many educational advantages.

means.word_mean: 教育(方面)的,为教育的;有教育意义的;提供咨询的

sentences.en: Only the educational elite go〔goes〕 to Oxford or Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 只有学业上的精英才能上牛津或剑桥大学。

sentences.en: Poor health and lack of money may both be barriers to educational progress.
sentences.cn: 身体不好与金钱匮乏都会妨碍学业的进展。

sentences.en: She confined her activities in educational circles.
sentences.cn: 她把她的各项活动都限制在教育界内。

sentences.en: The educational bureau demands that all schools introduce a new course into the curriculum.
sentences.cn: 教育局要求所有的学校开设一门新课程。

sentences.en: The government will direct the additional taxes to the educational reform.
sentences.cn: 政府把这些附加税收用于教育改革。
